Blizzard/Twister





*Blizzard continues to strangle Twister and Twister c=
ontinues to punch Blizzard*


(OOC: I don't have time for something big rig=
ht now, sorry.)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 18, 2000 3:24 AM
  Subject: Sinesis=
 VS. Sinister!...


  Sinesis aproaches his brother. He pulls out 2 swords,=
 one belonging to Sinister. He smiles and laughs loudly. Sinister grabs a s=
tick. He swings, misses. Sinesis beats Sinister repeatedly with the swords =
very quickly like a ninja. (Or like Steve Blackman the wrestler) Sinister's=
 mech fluid stains the ground as he rolls to get out of the way. Sinesis sp=
ins the swords and plunges one into Sinister's arm. Then the other, then he=
 lifts them up, Sinister and all, and slams him into a tree, impaling him o=
nto the tree. He then beat on Sinister freely. Sinister's shoulder opens, a=
 saw blade comes out and he saws the tree's bark off. He manages to cut eno=
ugh off of the tree to escape. Sinister grabs his own sword, but Sinesis re=
aches up and grabs his as well. They get ready to duel...

----------------=
--------------------------------------------------------------
